Grammar and MetamodelNoneNone *Model transformations are defined on top of metamodel constructs  NoneNone *Co-design of grammar and metamodelNoneNone<ul>   *Grammar defines the syntaxNoneNone   *Metamodel defines the structure NoneNone   *Xtext facilitates the metamodel design withNoneNone<ul>     *Default rules for inferring the metamodel from the grammarNoneNone     *Facilities to parameterize the inference  NoneNone</ul></ul> *Some transformations may be difficult to express. In this case two possible attitudes:NoneNone<ul>   *Revise the Xtext grammar and the underlying metamodel NoneNone   *Design another metamodel (from scrath) and write a model-to-model transformationNoneNone</ul>---
